SQLStringContainer.QuerySingle.Insert: INSERT INTO QRYQUERY(QUERYNAME, QUERYID, QUERYTYPE, QUERYSELECTEDTABLES, QUERYSELECTEDCOLUMNS, QUERYEDITTYPE, QUERYSQL, QUERYSHOWCOLUMNS, QUERYCONDITIONSQL, CREATOR, ISDATACONNECT, ISENCRYPT, QUERYDESC, CONDITIONMODE, ORDERCOLUMN) VALUES (@QUERYNAME, @QUERYID, @QUERYTYPE, @QUERYSELECTEDTABLES, @QUERYSELECTEDCOLUMNS, @QUERYEDITTYPE, @QUERYSQL, @QUERYSHOWCOLUMNS, @QUERYCONDITIONSQL, @CREATOR, @ISDATACONNECT, @ISENCRYPT, @QUERYDESC, @CONDITIONMODE, @ORDERCOLUMN)
SQLStringContainer.QuerySingle.Update: UPDATE QRYQUERY SET QUERYNAME = @QUERYNAME, QUERYTYPE = @QUERYTYPE, QUERYSELECTEDTABLES = @QUERYSELECTEDTABLES, QUERYSELECTEDCOLUMNS = @QUERYSELECTEDCOLUMNS, QUERYEDITTYPE = @QUERYEDITTYPE, QUERYSQL = @QUERYSQL, QUERYSHOWCOLUMNS = @QUERYSHOWCOLUMNS, QUERYCONDITIONSQL = @QUERYCONDITIONSQL, CREATOR = @CREATOR, ISDATACONNECT = @ISDATACONNECT, CONDITIONMODE = @CONDITIONMODE, ORDERCOLUMN = @ORDERCOLUMN, QUERYDESC = @QUERYDESC, ISENCRYPT = @ISENCRYPT WHERE QUERYID = @QUERYID

SQLStringContainer.QueryMulti.Update: UPDATE QRYQUERY SET QUERYNAME = @QUERYNAME, QUERYMULTISUMDIMENSION = @QUERYMULTISUMDIMENSION, QUERYTYPE = @QUERYTYPE, QUERYMULTICOLDIMENSION = @QUERYMULTICOLDIMENSION, QUERYSELECTEDTABLES = @QUERYSELECTEDTABLES, QUERYMULTIROWDIMENSION = @QUERYMULTIROWDIMENSION, QUERYSELECTEDCOLUMNS = @QUERYSELECTEDCOLUMNS, QUERYMULTISUMTYPE = @QUERYMULTISUMTYPE, QUERYSQL = @QUERYSQL, QUERYCONDITIONSQL = @QUERYCONDITIONSQL, CREATOR = @CREATOR, ISDATACONNECT = @ISDATACONNECT, CONDITIONMODE = @CONDITIONMODE, QUERYDESC = @QUERYDESC, ISENCRYPT = @ISENCRYPT WHERE QUERYID = @QUERYID
